concept.title: System Requirements
concept.shortdesc: Minimum system requirements for using Swift Mailer.

keywords.indexterm: system requirements PHP version memory requirements

conbody.p: Historically, Swift Mailer has supported both PHP 4 and PHP 5 by following a parallel development workflow. Now in it's fourth major version, with PHP 4 officially unsupported by it's developers at Zend, Swift Mailer will only operate on servers running PHP 5.2 or higher.

The basic requirements to operate Swift Mailer are extremely minimal and fairly obvious. The library aims to work with as many projects as possible:
PHP 5.2 or higher, with the SPL extension (standard)
Network access to connect to remote SMTP servers (default, port 25)
Approx 2MB memory free when using Disk Caching
Approx (1.3 x $attachment_size) MB of memory free when temporary file access not available
